title: Vacation of the alley at Samuel Shepard Compton

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 82     		INTRODUCED BY:  ALDERWOMAN MARLENE DAVIS      An ordinance recommended by the Board of Public Service to conditionally vacate above surface, surface and sub-surface rights for vehicle, equestrian and pedestrian travel in 15 foot wide east-west alley in City Block 1039 as bounded by Samuel Shepard Dr., Compton Ave., Washington Ave., and Leonard Ave. in the City of St. Louis, Missouri, as hereinafter described, in accordance with Charter authority, and in conformity with Section l4 of Article XXI of the Charter and imposing certain conditions on such vacation.
